biomeparticleweather.rain_amount.tooltip: Amount of rain particles spawned per tick. 0 disables this particle in a non thunderstorm
biomeparticleweather.heavy_rain_amount.t: Amount of rain particles spawned per tick while thundering. 0 disables this particle during a thunderstorm.
biomeparticleweather.snow_amount.tooltip: Amount of snow particles spawned per tick. 0 disables this particle
biomeparticleweather.fog_amount.tooltip: Amount of fog particles spawned per tick. 0 disables this particle
biomeparticleweather.blizzard_wind_amoun: Amount of blizzard wind particles spawned per tick. 0 disables this particle
biomeparticleweather.blizzard_snow_amoun: Amount of blizzard snow particles spawned per tick. 0 disables this particle
biomeparticleweather.sand_mote_amount.to: Amount of sand mote particles spawned per tick. 0 disables this particle
biomeparticleweather.red_sand_mote_amoun: Amount of red sand mote particles spawned per tick. 0 disables this particle
biomeparticleweather.tumblebush_amount.t: Amount of tumblebush particles spawned per tick. 0 disables this particle
biomeparticleweather.lightning_particle_: Amount of lightning particles per line segment of lightning
biomeparticleweather.updraft_amount.tool: Amount of updraft particles spawned per tick. 0 disables this particle
biomeparticleweather.soul_amount.tooltip: Amount of storm soul particle spawn attempts per tick. 0 disables this particle
biomeparticleweather.weeping_tear_amount: Amount of weeping tear particle spawn attempts per tick. 0 disables this particle
biomeparticleweather.spore_amount.toolti: Amount of spore particles spawned per tick. 0 disables this particle
biomeparticleweather.wind_amount.tooltip: Amount of wind particles spawned per tick. 0 disables this particle
biomeparticleweather.rain_trails.tooltip: Turning this off may improve performance.
biomeparticleweather.rain_splash.tooltip: Whether or not to spawn a splash particle when a rain drop lands.
biomeparticleweather.rain_surface_ripple: Whether or not to spawn ripples whenever a rain drop lands on water.
biomeparticleweather.vanilla_lightning.t: Whether or not to use vanilla lighting rendering instead of particles
biomeparticleweather.vanilla_rain_render: Whether vanilla rain renders or not.
biomeparticleweather.vanilla_rain_splash: Whether vanilla rain particles spawn, always on if vanilla rain rendering is on.
